snippet.title: Oddworld: Soulstorm - The Game Awards 2020 Trailer | PS5, PS4
snippet.description: The critically acclaimed Oddworld: Soulstorm is set to be Abe’s biggest adventure to date. Watch brand new gameplay in this explosive new trailer now, and find out why RockPaperShotgun gave it an E3 Editor’s Choice Award and Digital Foundry said “It blew me away.” Oddworld: Soulstom, coming spring 2021
